channel.title: [REQ] [508] Vesta, Statius etc armor/weapons

item.title: [REQ] [508] Vesta, Statius etc armor/weapons
item.dc:creator: @hiloser12221 hiloser12221
item.description:
@hiloser12221 wrote:

Hi, does anyone know of models/ints for the pvp armor/weapons in a 508 server? I have found multiple ones, but all modify class8 and unless that is correct for 508, I believe they have been for 317.

So if I can put my ints in class8 (the ints reference class8 so i assumed they go in class8?) would that work? Well rather, where do I put new model ints in a 508 server?

Here are the ints I am talking about:

if(i == 9801)
                        {
                        class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
                        class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";
                        class8.anInt174 = 14004;
                        class8.anInt181 = 1753;
                        class8.anInt190 = 562;
                        class8.anInt198 = 1;
                        class8.anInt194 = 11;
                        class8.anInt169 = -3;
                        class8.anInt204 = 0;
                        class8.anInt165 = 14005;
                        class8.anInt200 = 14006;
                        class8.aString170 = "Vesta's Plateskirt";
                        class8.aByteArray178 = "Vesta's Plateskirt, a reward from PVP.".getBytes();
                        }

Obviously the ID’s overlap with skillcapes in a 508 server so…

Any help is greatly appreciated.
